requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590/AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM or more GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 4GB, AMD Radeon R9 290 4GB equivalent or better VR Ready graphics card.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 900 MB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590/AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM or more GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070/Quadro P5000 equivalent or better, AMD Radeon Vega 56 equivalent or better VR Ready graphics card.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

requirements_en.minimum:

  • Processor: Intel i3-6100 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200, FX4350 or greater
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290 or greater
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: VR Only
